pvz.unit

Class PeaBullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • pvz.level.SerializableObservable
        • pvz.unit.Unit
          • pvz.unit.Bullet
            • pvz.unit.PeaBullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer

    public class PeaBullet
extends Bullet
    Concrete class of Bullet which does a specific amount of damage and causes no secondary effects on the Zombie it hits. The speed at which the bullet moves is dicated by MOVE_TRIGGER and how much damage each bullet does is set in DMG.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
